price: и да мајци својој будем добар, а неће ми допустити да будем дрзак и непристојан.
arabic: وَبَرَّۢا بِوَٰلِدَتِي وَلَمۡ يَجۡعَلۡنِي جَبَّارٗا شَقِيّٗا

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wabarran biwālidatī walam yajʿalnī jabbāran shaqiyyan
